channel.title: Django on Joan Perals — UX Developer
channel.description: Recent content in Django on Joan Perals — UX Developer

item.title: Importing blog posts from Django to Hugo
item.description: Last year I started a sort of basic Dango-based sort of simple blog just to jot down small software-related learnings in Markdown.

item.title: Django's `pre_save` signal
item.description: I found it useful for adding custom created_date and modified_date fields to a model without overriding its save method. I’d find a method-based syntax nicer, but it’s OK.

item.title: Django-markdown2 doesn't support fenced code blocks unless explicitly specified
item.description: The feature has to be added as an extra feature in the template tag: {{ some_text | markdown:"fenced-code-blocks" }}
One of my main tasks at Content Mind was to take care of the visual layer of a Plone-based health information portal.

More than 7 years developing high fidelity prototypes for clients big and small, uncluding Siemens, Bosch, Deutsche Telekom, and leading companies in the German automotive industry, with a strong focus on a user-centric design process.
